title: Ray sensor is not visualised when inserting the model multiple times

content.raw: I created a robot model with a ray sensor and tried to set the visualize parameter to be true. When I insert the robot model using gazebo GUI multiple times, only the first robot has a visualised ray sensor. However, if I used factory plugin to insert several models, but given the ray sensor on each model a different name, then the ray sensors can be correctly visualised on all robots.
content.html: I created a robot model with a ray sensor and tried to set the visualize parameter to be true. When I insert the robot model using gazebo GUI multiple times, only the first robot has a visualised ray sensor. However, if I used factory plugin to insert several models, but given the ray sensor on each model a different name, then the ray sensors can be correctly visualised on all robots.
